assay.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to test a substance, especially a metal, to see how pure it is or what it is made of
assay.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a test to show how pure a metal, drug etc is
assay.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The experiments were done under standard assay conditions.
assay.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to test something such as a metal or drug to find out how pure it is
assay.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: All samples were assayed in duplicate.
